pageTitle: University of Tennessee Libraries Text Collection Help: Glossary of search regions
textBeforeTable: Most searches in our texts allow you to select from among one or more "regions," or distinct areas of a work, to search within. All those regions that are available for searching are described in the table below, ordered by search type. Please note that, as you select more than one collection for searching, the list of available regions is adjusted to reflect the intersection of regions available for those collections Glossary of search regions   Using the bookbag Viewing search history Interpreting search results using word index -   using bibliographic search -   using proximity search -
